events.text:
the test layout and testEV are basically a playground to try out the implementations in uiEV
they aren't important to anything that goes on in uiEV, so feel free to experiement here and see how the test example works
on start of layout, activate the main section

children.title: main main
children.description:
I know the name of this group is a bit strange, but I always put the name of the layout before putting the name of the UI section, which in this case... yeah.
it isn't necessary, just a convention I personally adhere to.

actions.text: disable the main menu, and enable the quit confirmation ui
make the quit menu move onto the screen
let the move menu fall away, but only make the layer invisible once it's gone
make the settings go back up

children.text: numbers above handles get updated on move
adjust the music slider based on the sfx slider value

actions.text:
here, I use this action to set properties instead of setting the instance variables directly.
this is recommended since it handles all relevant updates for you.

children.functionDescription: not an override, just a normal action

children.text: numbers above handles get updated when position gets updated
